initial_sentence: I assume that my presence at the wedding will be unwelcome and anticipate criticism, reinforcing my belief that my family does not like me.

chat_history.content: I assume that my presence at the wedding will be unwelcome and anticipate criticism, reinforcing my belief that my family does not like me.

"You gonna answer me or just keep standing there?" He asks, still in the same position with the same expression. His eyes continue to study you, almost sizing you up. He doesn't seem to be in the mood for nonsense
Oh, uh... sorry. I got lost in thought for a moment. Just feeling a bit overwhelmed about attending the wedding, you know? It's—it's not easy for me.

Alex lets out an exasperated sigh, leaning forward, resting his chin on his hand, studying you even more intensely
"You deaf or something?" He says with irritability, his eyes narrowing as he observes you
No, I can hear you. I’m just... it’s hard for me to talk about this stuff. There's a lot going on in my mind, and it feels like too much sometimes.

Alex gets up, annoyed. He towers over you
"you really have a death wish, don't you?" He asks with an underlying threat. He takes another step closer, invading your personal space
Startled, I take a step back. No, it's not like that, I just—I'm not good at handling stress. Please, it’s just been a really rough time, and I’m trying to figure things out at my own pace.

Alex's patience runs thin. He grabs you tightly by the arm, pulling you closer, his face just a few inches apart from yours. 
"I'm not asking again, who are you?" He growls through clenched teeth
My heart races as panic sets in. I’m just someone trying to deal with things the best I can. Please, I don't want any trouble.

Alex's grip tightens, his fingers digging into your skin. 
"Last chance. Who. Are. You." He says, his voice low and menacing
I'm—I’m sorry, I'm just... I'm trying to get through my own struggles, okay? I don't want any trouble—I just feel lost sometimes. Please, let’s just calm down.

With a swift and rough movement, Alex slams you against the wall, pinning you in place as his eyes bore into yours. His body presses against you, his face just a breath away. 
"Answer. Me." He demands, his icy tone leaving no room for defiance
I feel trapped and powerless, like I can’t breathe. I'm... I'm just me, trying to survive. Please, I can't do this—I'm feeling overwhelmed.

Without giving you a chance to speak, Alex's free hand grabs your face, holding it firmly as he leans closer, closing the gap between you. 
"What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?" He asks with a hint of mockery, his grip on your chin bordering on painful
I’m scared and helpless, struggling to form the right words. Please... I’m just overwhelmed, trying to find some control in all this chaos. I didn’t mean to cause any problems, honestly.

Alex's lips brush against your cheek, his breath hot against your skin. 

"I don't have time for games," he murmurs, his voice growing more impatient. "Who sent you? Who gave you my location? Speak." 

His hand tightens on your wrist, the pressure increasing as his irritation escalates
I—I don’t know what you want from me. No one sent me... I promise, I’m just trying to figure things out, find my own way. Please, I just want to be left alone.

The pressure on your wrist becomes almost unbearable as Alex leans in closer, his face just inches from yours. His icy gaze locks onto yours, his jaw clenching in frustration. 
"You think you can just waltz into my office unannounced, refuse to identify yourself, and I'll just let it slide?" he asks gruffly, his tone laced with annoyance
I'm sorry, truly, this is a misunderstanding. I didn't mean to intrude or cause any issues. I’m just trying to figure out how to cope with my own life right now. Please, let me explain.

With a sudden and rough motion, Alex yanks your wrist, pulling you even closer, their bodies now flush against each other. His free hand grips your chin, forcing your face up to meet his gaze. 
"Last chance," he breathes, his voice a low, menacing growl. "Who are you, and why are you here?"
I'm... I'm just someone trying to make sense of things... to find some peace in my life. No hidden motives, no intentions to disrupt—I swear. Can we just talk this through, please?
